Updated autopay with new card via payment IVR - Customer is aware automatic payments will be taken on the due date going forward

Setup Promise to Pay Payment Amount (Full amount due): Payment Date: Payment Method (If known): Advised customer about the details of PTP: Y - Customer is aware payment must be received within 7 days - Customer is aware we will not accept another Promise to Pay for 90 days if they miss payment

Deactivated the PPP for: - Customer is aware they will no longer be covered by out of warranty phone issues - Customer is aware we cannot re-add the PPP
Customer inquiring about adding a new BYOD line

Added a new BYOD line Type: Prepaid/Postpaid MSISDN: Rate Plan: - Customer is aware of voice, text, and data features included in the plan - Customer is aware of plan pricing: - Customer is aware of promotions: DD, BYOP $5x24 starting on 2nd bill - Customer is aware of the standard timeline for direct fulfillment: 5-7 Business Days - Customer has signed the contract package

Completed Hardware Upgrade Type: TradeUp/MyTab MSISDN: Device: - Customer is aware of plan pricing: - Customer is aware of device charge: - Customer is aware of the trade up return value: - Customer is aware of promotions: DD - Customer is aware of the standard timeline for direct fulfillment: 5-7 Business Days - Customer has signed the contract package
Customer inquiring about completing a MSISDN swap
Swapped MSISDN for: Swapped MSISDN to: - Customer is aware the MSISDN swap fee is: $10 - Customer is aware to restart phone after the swap
Customer inquiring about porting in a phone number

Submitted port-in request - Customer is aware to respond to port out auth text message with YES within 90 minutes - Customer is aware that the number will port over within 60 minutes if all info is correct MSISDN to port: Existing Freedom Mobile MSISDN to Replace: INCOMING MSISDN is active: Yes Wireless/Wireline: Wireless Carrier: Cx Name w/ Carrier: Address w/ Carrier: Account Number, PIN and/or IMEI w/ Carrier:
Customer inquiring about porting out a phone number

Had RTS assist with manual port out authorization - Customer is aware the number will be ported to the new carrier within 60 minutes - Customer is aware that we will stop billing for the line as of today
Customer inquiring about a missing promotion for: Promotion:
Customer inquiring about completing a rate plan change

Completed Rate Plan Change for: Rate Plan: Future Dated: No - Customer is aware of pricing: - Customer is aware of promos: DD, BYOP $5x24 starting on 2nd bill - Customer is aware of proration that will appear on the next bill
Customer inquiring about suspending the service with a vacation suspension

Setup Vacation Suspend MSISDN: Future Dated for: Number of Months: - Customer is aware $15/mo charge for each month suspended will be billed on next invoice - Customer is aware they can request an early reconnect if necessary
Customer inquiring about resuming the service from a vacation suspension
Resumed from Vacation Suspend MSISDN: - Customer is aware that there will be a prorated charge for resuming service early
Customer inquiring about suspending the service with a voluntary suspension for:
Suspended service at customer's request MSISDN: - Customer is aware they will continue to be charged the regular MRC while suspended
Customer inquiring about resuming the service from a voluntary suspension
Resumed service at customer's request MSISDN:

At the customer's request, disclosed the account number
Customer inquiring about getting their suspended line reactivated
Advised that service can be resumed with a minimum payment of: Advised that we are unable to make a promise to pay due to recent broken promise
Customer inquiring about completing a SIM swap
Advised customer to visit retail to complete Sim Swap -or- Walked customer through completing sim swap via self serve options in My Account
Customer inquiring about completing a TOR

Advised to have authorized users from donor and recipient account visit retail to complete TOR - Customer is aware we cannot guarantee that promotions will transfer to the new account - Customer is aware any active MyTabs would have to be paid off prior to transfer
Customer inquiring about how much data is included in their plan and how much is used

Usage Inquiry Advised customer has a total of: GB Advised customer has used: GB - Customer is aware that service will be throttled if the data is fully used - Customer is aware that the data will refresh on:
Customer inquiring about roaming options for:

Added Addon for: Addon: Future Dated: No - Customer is aware the pass includes unlimited local or back-to-Canada calling - Customer is aware the pass includes unlimited global texting - Customer is aware data pay per use charges will apply if they fully consume the data - Customer is aware to enable the roaming feature on the device
Customer inquiring about the bill, the bill is higher than expected
Reviewed the bill with the customer The reason the bill is higher than expected:
Customer inquiring about the account, asking about their deposit

Advised customer to make all payments and remain in good standing until assessment date Deposit Assessment Date: Deposit Refund Method: Cheque / Service Credit - Customer is aware they will receive a refund for the deposit amount - Customer is aware they will be migrated to a standard postpaid account
Customer inquiring about the account, asking about pay per use charges
Explained the PPU charges to the customer in detail
Customer inquiring about the account, asking about getting a refund

Provided Refund Details Type: Credit Card - Customer is aware refund will be issued back onto the same credit card - Customer is aware of the timeline for CC refund: 5-7 Business Days after final invoice -or- Provided Refund Details Type: Cheque Reconfirmed Address - Customer is aware refund will be issued by cheque to the address on file - Customer is aware of the timeline for refund cheque: 6-8 Weeks after final invoice

Provided Device Info Type: TradeUp/MyTab Device: Monthly Charge for 24 months: Retail Price: Upfront: $0.00 TradeUp Amount: Savings:

Deactivated Line: - Customer is aware service is disconnected immediately - Customer is aware the action cannot be reversed - Customer is aware the phone number will not be available to be ported out - Customer is aware there will be a proration on the next bill for the cancellation
